setSpecificPlanetInfo: 3=135=description=Raceedat is currently subject to a security lockdown maintained by order of the ATU. Only vessels with appropriate authorisation are permitted to enter the system.

setSpecificPlanetInfo: 3=135=description=Raceedat is currently being held under the control of the ATU. Pilots are advised that Raceedat's Coriolis Station remains out of action, and should request docking instructions from the Orbital Transit Station run by the Agricultural Engineering Enterprise.

setSpecificPlanetInfo: 3=135=description=Raceedat is currently under the protection of the ATU and has elected Timon Delaney as its new President. Pilots are advised that Raceedat Station has now returned to operation and previous entry restrictions to the system have now been lifted.

commsMessage: Captain Suslov: Well done, Commander - we've managed to repulse the attack! Now we should destroy their flagship and stop this once and for all!
commsMessage: Captain Suslov: The enemy has been destroyed - we have saved the system! All units are cleared to return to base.
commsMessage: Captain Suslov: We have lost the battle - Raceedat Station has been destroyed! All units, evacuate immediately to Usisis!

setSpecificPlanetInfo: 3=135=description=Raceedat is currently subject to a security lockdown maintained by order of the ATU. Only vessels with appropriate authorisation are permitted to enter the system.
gui_screen_string oneof GUI_SCREEN_MAIN, GUI_SCREEN_STATUS, GUI_SCREEN_EQUIP_SHIP, GUI_SCREEN_MARKET, GUI_SCREEN_SHORT_RANGE_CHART

setSpecificPlanetInfo: 3=197=description=Dicebe is administered by a Communist government with close trade and defence ties with its neighbour, Raceedat. Together they represent two of the most advanced Communist systems in the galaxy.
gui_screen_string oneof GUI_SCREEN_MAIN, GUI_SCREEN_STATUS, GUI_SCREEN_EQUIP_SHIP, GUI_SCREEN_MARKET, GUI_SCREEN_SHORT_RANGE_CHART
gui_screen_string oneof GUI_SCREEN_MAIN, GUI_SCREEN_STATUS, GUI_SCREEN_EQUIP_SHIP, GUI_SCREEN_MARKET, GUI_SCREEN_SHORT_RANGE_CHART
gui_screen_string oneof GUI_SCREEN_MAIN, GUI_SCREEN_STATUS, GUI_SCREEN_EQUIP_SHIP, GUI_SCREEN_MARKET, GUI_SCREEN_SHORT_RANGE_CHART
mission_trident_down oneof DEFENDRACEEDAT1-LOCKED, ASSAULTBRIEFA-LOCKED, COMMSTATIONBRIEFA-LOCKED, ESWNOFRIEND-LOCKED, BIANTIESWSTORY-LOCKED
commsMessage: Incoming Message: please report to the nearest GalCop station as soon as possible.
commsMessage: Urgent message: please make contact with Security Chief Amon Ghal'ut as soon as possible.
commsMessage: Commander, you have a message from Security Chief Ghal'ut. Please report to the nearest spaceport as soon as possible.
mission_trident_down oneof FINDAGENTS, PLAYFAIRDEAD, EZRADEAD, EZRAARRIVAL
mission_trident_down oneof FINDAGENTS, JENSSENDEAD, EZRADEAD, EZRAARRIVAL
commsMessage: Well done, Commander, That's the three agents dealt with. We can now go ahead and arrest the dissidents - we'll make further contact with you soon.
commsMessage: ATTENTION: Commander [commander_name], you are under arrest on the order of the ATU.
commsMessage: Incoming message: Commander, you are required by Colonel Bodarenko of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. Please make your way to the nearest Security Police station as soon as possible.
commsMessage: %H Security Police: Commander, your package has been left for collection outside the Space Station.
commsMessage: Incoming message: Commander, please report the nearest Security Police station as soon as possible.
commsMessage: Incoming message: Welcome to %H, Comrade Commander. We hope you enjoy your stay.
commsMessage: Prisoner Transport DK-322: You are cleared for launch.
commsMessage: Commander, you should be able to pick up the comms station on your compass - look for an X-beacon. Good luck!
commsMessage: Well done, Commander - that's the station disabled. Our fleet will now proceed to Aarza - you should meet us there.
commsMessage: Commodore Delaney: Commander, I am on board the ISS Imperator. Send a request for docking instructions once you are in range.
commsMessage: Commodore Delaney: Commander, I am on board the ISS Imperator. Send a request for docking instructions once you are in range.
commsMessage: Commodore Delaney: Commander, we are just about to launch our assault. Join the bomber formations and protect them from enemy fighters.
commsMessage: Captain Suslov: Attention all ships: we have the enemy fleet on our radar. Check your compass for an X-beacon.
commsMessage: Incoming message: Commander, please make your way to the nearest Security Police station as soon as possible.
commsMessage: Incoming message: Commander, you are required by Commodore Delaney. Please make your way to Raceedat as quickly as possible.
commsMessage: Incoming message: Warning - this is a restricted system. No unauthorised entry is permitted. All vessels must immediately report to Isanla Station for security clearance.
commsMessage: Commodore Delaney: Commander, your package has been left for collection outside the Space Station.
commsMessage: The Communist agent has escaped! He will soon be reaching Bianti!
commsMessage: Amon Ghal'ut: OK, Commander. Locate the ATU fleet and then call in the squadron using the homing beacon.
commsMessage: Amon Ghal'ut: Well done, Commander - we've managed to neutralise the ATU attack! You'd better get yourself to safety while we sort things out. We'll be in touch.
commsMessage: Amon Ghal'ut: We were too late! Raceedat Station has been destroyed by the ATU!
